landing.title: Fumana Iqela Lakho Lezopolitiko
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo malunga neembono zakho zezopolitiko uze ufumanise ukuba leliphi iqela loMzantsi Afrika elihambelana neenqobo zakho.
landing.privacy: Iimpendulo zakho zigcinwe kwindawo kwaye azikhe zabelwane.

about.title: Malunga ne-isiVote
about.methodologyText: I-isiVote isebenzisa inkqubo yamanqaku ukudibanisa iimbono zakho zezopolitiko namaqela ezopolitiko aseMzantsi Afrika.
about.privacyText: Ubumfihlo bakho bubalulekile. Asiqokeleli ulwazi lomntu ka no≈°i noma iimpendulo zemibuzo. Kuphela i-language preference yakho igcinwe kwindawo kwisixhobo sakho. Iimpendulo zemibuzo zakho zikhunyelwe ngqo kwi-URL xa ubantu bagcina - ayikho ibhaliso eserveni, akukho i-database, ayikho ilandelelaniselo. Sisebenzisa iCloudflare Web Analytics, entle-hloniphanispiru e ngatoli-cookies, elathelelaniseli abantu, nangethola ulwazi lomntu. Iziphumo zakho ziyakho ukuzabela okanye ukuzigcina kwicinile ngokupheleleyo kwiigqatso zakho.
about.partiesText: Sibandakanya amaqela amakhulu ali-11 ezopolitiko aseMzantsi Afrika.
about.disclaimerText: Esi sixhobo sisetyenziselwa ulwazi kuphela kwaye asisiyongcebiso yokuvota.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress liqela elilawulayo eMzantsi Afrika.

mk.desc: I-uMkhonto we Sizwe Party igxile kutshintsho lwezoqoqosho oluqinile.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters liqela elikwesobunxele kakhulu.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party ikhuthaza iinqobo zenkcubeko yamaZulu.

vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus imele iimfuno zama-Afrikaner.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA liqela elisembindini eligxile kulawulo olusebenzayo.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party ikhuthaza iinqobo zobuKristu.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change igxile ekudibaniseni abantu.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party imele ubukomanisi.

q1.text: Izalachichwa kufanele zibe simahla zze zibonelelwe yirhulumeni kubo bonke.

q2.text: Iimfundo eziphezulu (iikoleji kunye namanyunivesithi) kufanele zibe simahla kubo bonke abafundi.

q3.text: Isifunda kufanele sikwenze isibonelelo sezimali yesiseko kubo bonke abantu, nokuba kukhomba izintela eziphakameleyo okanye umqolo.

q4.text: Irhulumeni kufanele inyuse intela kubo bantu abayimpumelelo ukuthandela iziniselezo zomuntu.

q5.text: Irhulumeni kufanele itshale ngamandla amanzi ezo indlu zabantu abanezindinganiso ezikwindlela, nokuba kukhomba ukuba izinye izinsiza ziyaliswa.

q6.text: Ukuthuthuka komhla wasetingwini kunye nenkxaso yezolimo kufanele zifumane iqambela lenkulu ephakameleyo kunye nokutsala ngobu.

q7.text: Abasebenzi kufanele babe nabambo abamakhulu okufa kunye nokunegotiyetha ngokuthe ngqo nezibancibenci kunye ngaphandle kokungenelela kwerhulumeni.

q8.text: Ukulungiswa Kwezomnotho Kwabantu Abamnyama (BEE) kunye nenkxaso yezifo kufanele ziqhubeke njengezikhundla eziphakameleyo zerhulumeni.

q9.text: Ukuthatha umhlaba womuntu ngaphandle kwemali ithile iyakufuneka ukufikela ekutshintsheni komhlaba.

q10.text: UMthetho-sisekelo kufanele utshintshwe ukuvumela uguquko olukhulu kunye nokumnika irhulumeni amandla okusasaza ingcwele.

q11.text: IMzantsi Afrika kufanele isixhasi senkqubo yethengi enokundibela e-izindustriya zasekhaya, nokuba kukhomba amtengo amanzi okuthenga.

q12.text: Elizwe kufanele likhusele amandla akabusha (ilanga, umoya) ekubeni namagumbi eamakola.

q13.text: Ukungenelela okuqinile ekusasazeni (nokuba kukhomba abaholi bakamuva) kubalulekile kunokushaya kwesidumbu.

q14.text: Ukunciphisa uhozi, irhulumeni kufanele igxile ekuthuthweni kugqwesa kunokuthandela izizathu zezentlalo njengomsulwini.

q15.text: Abantu abangena kwanggeshini kufanele basulwe kunye nongezelelo lwamaphandle. enokundibela kusebenze kwanumzane womuntu noMzantsi Afrika.
